item.title: Decoding and playing audio files in Linux
item.description: Table of contents Overview FFmpeg SoX ALSA (libasound) PulseAudio Other libraries Notes Overview I was playing with various media libraries recently and have prepared several snippets demonstrating how one can decode and play an audio file in two separate steps. The source code is available on GitHub here and there. The following libraries are used: FFmpeg SoX ALSA (libasound) PulseAudio libsndfile Each snippet is a small program.
